title: Full helmet

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Full helmet is armour worn in the headwear slot. Full helmets are stronger than medium helmets, providing a higher defence bonus, and are used primarily by warriors. The helmets, as with all melee-oriented gear, give good defence against ranged attacks, but are weak against magic.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Full helmThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Large Helmets
See also: Medium helmet
Full helmet
SlotHelmet slot
TypeMelee

A Full helmet is armour worn in the headwear slot. Full helmets are stronger than medium helmets, providing a higher defence bonus, and are used primarily by warriors. The helmets, as with all melee-oriented gear, give good defence against ranged attacks, but are weak against magic.

Full helms are heavier than medium helmets, some full helmets and their trimmed parts do have plumes. Trimmed and gold-trimmed armours have grey and gold plumes respectively, and the god helmets have plume colours representing the god to which they are aligned.
